title: 3 mystery gifts from riot?
body:
Ok so I have no clue if anyone else recieved this, however I just recieved 3 skin gifts from riot games and I have no reason why. Can someone explain why I recieved this or was it just a glitch?

Thanks

replies.body: I took a look into the account you're posting from and wasn't able to see any gifts being received.  Ht us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the contents reportedly received, and we'll take a look.  We will reply back as soon as we can!
